mapper.select: SELECT c_name, c_code, c_code_ref, c_level from Category;
mapper.insert: insert into Product (p_name, p_price, p_content, p_stock, p_view, p_made, p_usedate, product_c_code,p_img,p_thumbImg) values (#{p_name}, #{p_price}, #{p_content}, #{p_stock}, '0', #{p_made}, #{p_usedate}, #{product_c_code},#{p_img},#{p_thumbImg});
